properties.displayName: CIS Microsoft Azure Foundations Benchmark v1.1.0
properties.description: The Center for Internet Security (CIS) is a nonprofit entity whose mission is to 'identify, develop, validate, promote, and sustain best practice solutions for cyberdefense.' CIS benchmarks are configuration baselines and best practices for securely configuring a system. These policies address a subset of CIS Microsoft Azure Foundations Benchmark v1.1.0 controls. For more information, visit https://aka.ms/cisazure110-initiative

metadata.displayName: List of regions where Network Watcher should be enabled
metadata.description: To see a complete list of regions use Get-AzLocation
Name of the resource group of NetworkWatcher, such as NetworkWatcherRG

metadata.displayName: List of virtual machine extensions that are approved for use
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of virtual machine extensions; to see a complete list of extensions, use Get-AzVMExtensionImage
